title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation for apprehending William Berkenhead
author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: "Given at the council chamber at Whitehall, the one and thirtieth day of August, 1696, in the eighth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
